titleStmt.title: The parson's counsellor with the law of tithes or tithing in two books : the first sheweth the order every parson, vicar, &c. ought to observe in obtaining a spiritual preferment, and what duties are incumbent upon him ... : the second shews in what manner all sorts of tithes, offerings, mortuaries, and other church-duties are to be paid ... / written by Sir Simon Degge, Kt.
titleStmt.author: Degge, Simon, Sir, 1612-1704.

titleStmt.title: The parson's counsellor with the law of tithes or tithing in two books : the first sheweth the order every parson, vicar, &c. ought to observe in obtaining a spiritual preferment, and what duties are incumbent upon him ... : the second shews in what manner all sorts of tithes, offerings, mortuaries, and other church-duties are to be paid ... / written by Sir Simon Degge, Kt.
titleStmt.author: Degge, Simon, Sir, 1612-1704.

notesStmt.note: "The second part, being the law of tithes or tithing" has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
